CustomField.description:
Notes specifically to describe current health status
The Field Label has been changed form "CS Health Notes" to "CS Sentiment Notes" as per the request of Cs team Jira- GTMS-2302
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sentiment rationale: (1-2 sentences; high-level, factual and concrete examples) Open technical issues - (pending/in progress technical issues or incompleted feature commits) Actions to address issues - (asks for product or support)
CustomField.label: CS Sentiment Notes
